nls.description: Review process for Operations and Proposal documents
nls.name: Document Review

nls.description: The system checks the document type to determine which step to take next.
nls.name: Document Type is Operations or Proposal?

nls.description: The project manager gets a notification to review the proposal document, then approve or reject it.
nls.name: Project Manager Approves or Rejects Proposal Document

Action.aiSubject: Please review Proposal document for project: ${thisProject.name}

nls.description: This notification is sent to the product manager to review the document.
nls.name: Review Proposal Document Action

message.name: Revisi el document de proposta per al proyecto: ${thisProject.name}
Posuďte dokument návrhu projektu: ${thisProject.name}
Gennemgå dokumentet med forslag for projekt: ${thisProject.name}
Revise el documento de propuesta para el proyecto: ${thisProject.name}
Tarkista projektin uusi tarjousasiakirja: ${thisProject.name}
Révisez le document de proposition pour le projet : ${thisProject.name}
Ellenőrizze a következő projekt javaslati dokumentumát : ${thisProject.name}
Eseguire la revisione del documento di proposta per il progetto : ${thisProject.name}
このプロジェクトの提案ドキュメントをレビューしてください: ${thisProject.name}
${thisProject.name} 프로젝트에 대한 제안 문서를 검토하십시오.
Beoordeel voorsteldocument voor project: ${thisProject.name}
Gjennomgå forslagsdokument for prosjekt: ${thisProject.name}
Przejrzyj dokumentację ofertową projektu: ${thisProject.name}
Analise o documento da proposta do projeto: ${thisProject.name}
Granska förslagsdokumentet för projekt: ${thisProject.name}
Lütfen proje için Teklif belgesini gözden geçirin: ${thisProject.name}
请复查此项目的提议文档: ${thisProject.name}
請檢閱專案 ${thisProject.name} 的 [提案] 文件
Выполните проверку предложения для проекта: ${thisProject.name}
Prüfen Sie das Vorschlagsdokument für Projekt: ${thisProject.name}
Please review Proposal document for project: ${thisProject.name}

nls.description: The project manager gets a notification to review the operations document, then approve or reject it.
nls.name: Project Manager Approves or Rejects Operations Document

Action.aiSubject: Please review a new document for project: ${thisProject.name}

nls.description: This notification is sent to the product manager to review the document.
nls.name: Operations Document Review Action Item

message.name: Revisi un document nou per al proyecto: ${thisProject.name}
Posuďte nový dokument projektu: ${thisProject.name}.
Gennemgå et nyt dokument for projekt: ${thisProject.name}
Prüfen Sie ein neues Dokument für Projekt: ${thisProject.name}
Please review a new document for project: ${thisProject.name}
Revise un documento nuevo para el proyecto: ${thisProject.name}
Tarkista projektin uusi asiakirja: ${thisProject.name}
Révisez le nouveau document pour le projet : ${thisProject.name}
Ellenőrizze a következő projekt egy új dokumentumát : ${thisProject.name}
Eseguire la revisione di un nuovo documento per il progetto : ${thisProject.name}
このプロジェクトの新しいドキュメントをレビューしてください: ${thisProject.name}
${thisProject.name} 프로젝트에 대한 새 문서를 검토하십시오.
Beoordeel een nieuw document voor project: ${thisProject.name}
Gjennomgå et nytt dokument for prosjekt: ${thisProject.name}
Przejrzyj nowy dokument projektu: ${thisProject.name}
Analise o novo documento do projeto: ${thisProject.name}
Выполните проверку нового документа для проекта: ${thisProject.name}
Granska ett nytt dokument för projekt: ${thisProject.name}
Lütfen proje için yeni bir belgeyi gözden geçirin: ${thisProject.name}
请复查此项目的新文档: ${thisProject.name}
請檢閱專案 ${thisProject.name} 的新文件

nls.description: The system checks if the project manager approved or rejected the document.
nls.name: Approved or Rejected?

nls.description: If the product manager rejected the document then the system updates the document status to Rejected and notifies the document owner.
nls.name: Update Status to Rejected and Notify Document Owner

Action.aiSubject: The project manager rejected your document: ${thisDocument.name}

nls.description: The Document Owner is notified that the document was rejected.
nls.name: Notify Owner Document Rejected

message.name: El gestor de projectes ha rebutjat el documento: ${thisDocument.name}.
Manažer projektu zamítl váš dokument: ${thisDocument.name}.
Projektlederen har afvist dit dokument: ${thisDocument.name}
Der Projektmanager hat Ihr Dokument abgelehnt: ${thisDocument.name}
The project manager rejected your document: ${thisDocument.name}
El gestor de proyectos ha rechazado el documento: ${thisDocument.name}.
Projektipäällikkö hylkäsi asiakirjan: ${thisDocument.name}
Le chef de projets a rejeté votre document : ${thisDocument.name}
A projektvezető elutasította a következő dokumentumát: ${thisDocument.name}
Documento rifiutato dal manager di progetto: ${thisDocument.name}
プロジェクト マネージャはドキュメントを拒否しました: ${thisDocument.name}
프로젝트 관리자가 ${thisDocument.name} 문서를 거부했습니다.
De projectmanager heeft uw document afgewezen: ${thisDocument.name}
Prosjektlederen forkastet dokumentet ditt: ${thisDocument.name}
Kierownik projektu odrzucił dokument: ${thisDocument.name}
O gerente do projeto rejeitou seu documento: ${thisDocument.name}
Менеджер проекта отклонил документ: ${thisDocument.name}
Projektledaren har avvisat ditt dokument: ${thisDocument.name}
Proje yöneticisi belgenizi reddetti: ${thisDocument.name}
项目经理已拒绝您的文档: ${thisDocument.name}
專案經理已否決您的文件：${thisDocument.name}

nls.name: Update Status to Approved and Notify Document Owner

Action.aiSubject: The project manager approved your document: ${thisDocument.name}

message.name: El gestor de projectes ha aprovat el documento: ${thisDocument.name}.
Manažer projektu schválil váš dokument: ${thisDocument.name}.
Projektlederen har godkendt dit dokument: ${thisDocument.name}

The project manager approved your document: ${thisDocument.name}

Projektipäällikkö hyväksyi asiakirjan: ${thisDocument.name}

A projektvezető jóváhagyta a következő dokumentumát: ${thisDocument.name}
Documento approvato dal manager di progetto: ${thisDocument.name}
